sentences.english: Results Medical record mass gets rise.
sentences.chinese: 結果病案質量得到提高。

sentences.english: Trypanosoma gambiense is responsible for ninety percent of the reported cases of sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 昏睡病病案報告的90%起因於岡比亞錐蟲。

sentences.english: We mark out its concrete sub-type of pathology during front page of medical records entering.
sentences.chinese: 我們在病案首頁錄入中註明其具體的病理學亞型。

sentences.english: This is a case of Hashimoto's thyroiditis with complication of insufficient thyroid function.
sentences.chinese: 此病案是橋本氏甲狀腺炎併發甲狀腺功能不足症。

sentences.english: Objective to investigate the thinking of disability identification in the hospital under electronic medical record platform.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電子病案平臺下醫院殘情鑑定的工作思路。

sentences.english: Objectives To strengthen safety management of medical records in circulation process.
sentences.chinese: 目的加強病案在流通使用過程中的安全管理。

sentences.english: Methods Analyzing the data of medical record duplication by statistics.
sentences.chinese: 方法對本院複印的病案數據進行統計分析。

sentences.english: Methods The documentation of 426 medical records of death was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法對426例死亡病案書寫內容進行分析。

sentences.english: I worked in the medical-record department of a small hospital.
sentences.chinese: 我在一家小醫院的病案室工作。

sentences.english: There have been genuine cases of gum gumming up intestines.
sentences.chinese: 史上確實有口香糖粘住了腸子的病案。

sentences.english: Objective to enhance quality and efficiency of medical records management.
sentences.chinese: 目的提升病案管理工作質量與效率。

sentences.english: Electronic medical records are important components of hospital information system.
sentences.chinese: 電子病案是醫院信息體系的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Results The medical record management in our country had laggard.
sentences.chinese: 結果我國病案管理與時代發展相對滯後。

definition: (TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse/to make such a diagnosis

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
a tried and tested medical prescription
